column4: ﻿emorris: I tried that as well.. they also re-appeared ... I finally deleted the folders "files" and "info" ... but something must be kinda messed up and is why I am getting these strange errors
﻿emorris: this is the message I get when I click on the Trash icon in gksudo nautilus: Sorry, couldn't display all the contents of "trash": Operation not supported
please do not run nautilus as root.
